root: ^I’m very glad that you all came today. I know we’ve had our ups and downs, but isn’t that just the path of life?
^Facing adversity and coming together stronger from the struggle.
^“That is why I’ve decided to hold this one last game between my closest friends. It will be a murder mystery game.
^Then, after all’s said and done and the culprit is caught, I’ll do what most of you came here for. I’ll reveal my big secret.
^But let’s not worry about that for now. The game is afoot!
^Garry raises glass and takes a sip of his wine. The remaining partygoers follow suit and drink from their glasses.
^(Not one to turn down a good wine, I take a sip of the drink. It tastes regal and well-defined with hints of something extra that adds a slight tanginess to the overall flavor.)
^A few seconds later, Dahlia falls unconscious
^Garry, what the hell was in that drink?! Ngh…. My head…
^(One after the other everyone was knocked out. It was taking what little power I could muster to hold myself up, my hands gripping the table sheet.)
^(Garry has his usual smirk across his face, taking another sip of his wine as he waits for me to join the others in unconsciousness.)
^(What the hell was that Garry thinking? Is this part of his stupid game?! My head feels foggy… It’s taking all of my strength to keep my eyes open as a haze washes over my mind.)
^Guess I’m frog… in my old age. Was supposed to… Let the game begin!
^(I can barely make out Garry’s mad laughter, my face hitting the table as everything goes dark.)
